card.name: Alcadeias, Lord of Spirits
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. ■ Double Breaker ■ Players can't cast spells other than light spells.

card.name: Petrova, Channeler of Suns
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a race other than Mecha Del Sol. Each creature of that race gets +4000 power. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he Unchoosable

card.name: Asylum, Elemental Dragon Knight
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Sympathy ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature would be destroyed, add it to your shields face down instead.

card.name: Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Valiant Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. ■ Metamorph

card.name: Super Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: Bolmeteus Musha Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

card.name: Musha Lupia
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ Whenever your "tooltip

card.name: Flameburn Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

card.name: Saint Bolshack, Elemental Dragon Knight
card.text: ■ Multi ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each Angel Command and Armored Dragon in your graveyard. It can't cost less than 2. ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Ulpheus, Dragonic Elemental
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have at least one Dragon or Angel Command in your graveyard, you may cast a spell that has "shield trigger" from your hand For No Cost ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Endra Pappi
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever you put an Angel Command or a Dragon into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Ambitious Dragon
card.text: ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each of your Fire Birds in the battle zone. ■ While you have a Fire Bird in the battle zone, this creature has "double breaker".

card.name: Ultimus, Divine Law Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, search your deck. You may take a spell that has "Shield Trigger" from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Seventh, Light Divine Dragon
card.text: ■ Each of your Dragons in the battle zone gets "blocker".

card.name: Elementius Thunderbolt Dragon
card.text: ■ While you have no shields, this creature gets "speed attacker". ■ When your last shield is broken, before you break that shield destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. ■ When your last shield is put into your graveyard, before you put that shield into your graveyard, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. ■ Double Breaker
